text_question_merge: Phatikizani ma bookmark apano ndi ma bookmark omwe mwatumizidwa kapena m'malo mwawo
text_importexport_content: Apa mutha kulowetsa ndi kutumiza zikhomo zanu mumtundu wa Netscape.
text_help_content1: Ma Bookmarks Manager ndi ntchito yomwe imathandizira kusunga ndikusintha ma bookmark a intaneti.
text_help_content2: Kuti mupange chikhomo chatsopano, kapena chikwatu chatsopano, dinani chizindikiro cha "kuphatikiza": sankhani pakati pa bookmark ndi chikwatu, ikani mutuwo kenako ulalo, kenako dinani kusunga kuti musunge zosinthazo, kapena pezani kufufuta kuti muchotse chizindikiro, kapena kubwerera kudumpha zosintha koma sungani chizindikiro.
text_help_content3: Dinani batani "lotseguka" pafupi ndi bookmark kuti mutsegule ulalo wogwirizana.
text_help_content4: Dinani batani "kuwonjezera" mkati mwa chikwatu kuti muwonjezere chinthu chatsopano.
text_help_content5: Kwa ma bookmark ndi mafoda onse, dinani batani "edit" kuti musinthe, dinani batani "kubwerera" kuti musinthe malo ndi chinthu cham'mbuyomu, kanikizani batani "kupita patsogolo" kuti musinthe malo ndi chinthu chotsatira, dinani batani "sunthirani mmwamba" kuti musunthire fodayo kuchokera pomwe ikupezeka, kapena dinani batani "pitani pansi" kuti musunthire chinthucho mkati mwa chikwatu chotsatira.
text_help_content6: Pazosankha zakusintha, zopezeka mutadina pazithunzi "zosintha", mutha kubisala kapena kuwonetsa mabatani okusintha, kuyenda ndi kuwonjezera. Ndikothekanso kusintha chilankhulo chogwiritsa ntchito.
text_help_content7: Kuti mulowetse kapena kutumiza ma bookmark, dinani pachizindikiro cholowa / kutumiza. Mtundu wa HTML Netscape Bookmarks umathandizidwa, chifukwa chake ndizotheka kuitanitsa ma bookmark omwe amatumizidwa ndi asakatuli akuluakulu. Mukamatumiza ma bookmark kuchokera mu fayilo, ma bookmark apano adzachotsedwa ndikulembanso.
text_help_content8: Ma Bookmarks Manager ndi Progressive Web Application, zomwe zikutanthauza kuti zimayenda mkati mwa msakatuli. Mukayiyika, pomwe zosatsegula sizikuwonetsedwa, imayendabe mkati mwa msakatuli. Zikhomo zimasungidwa pakasungidwe kakusakatula kwamasamba a bookmark.marcoparrone.com. localStorage imagwira ntchito bwino ndi asakatuli a Chrome, Edge ndi Firefox. Masakatuli ena akhoza kuchotsa LocalStorage patapita nthawi. Android mwachisawawa imagwiritsa ntchito Chrome, Windows posintha Edge. Ma Bookmark Manager pakadali pano samathandizidwa pazinthu za Apple. Ndi cholinga chothandizira kupewa kutayika kwa ma bookmark, tikulimbikitsidwa kuti tisungire zosunga zobwezeretsera pogwiritsa ntchito "kutumiza" kwina, nthawi iliyonse mukasintha zina zomwe simukufuna kutaya.
text_about_content3: SOFTWARE IMAPEREKEDWA "MONGA IYO", POPANDA CHITSIMIKIZO CHA MTUNDU WONSE, KUFOTOKOZA KAPENA KUKHUDZITSIDWA, KUPhatikizira KOMA OSALI MALIRE KWA ZOKHUDZITSA NTCHITO ZABWINO, ZOKHUDZA CHOLINGA CHOSANGALALA NDI CHIPHUNZITSO. OLEMBEDWA KAPENA OGWIRITSA MALAMULO ACHIKHALIDWE ADZAKHALIDWA POFUNA ZONSE, ZOCHITIKA KAPENA ZOCHITIKA ZINA, NGAKHALE KUCHITA KWA PANGANO, TORT KAPENA KANTHAWI KOMANSO, KUCHOKERA KU, KAPENA KAPENA KULUMIKIZANA NDI SOFTWARE KAPENA KUGWIRITSA NTCHITO KAPENA ZINTHU ZINA ZOPEREKA Mapulogalamu.
text_about_content4: UTUMIKI Uwu UTHANDIZA KUMASULIRA KWAMBIRI KWA GOOGLE. GOOGLE IMANENESA ZITSIMBIKITSO ZONSE ZOKHUDZANA NDI KUMASULIRA, KUFOTOKOZA KAPENA KUWONETSEDWA, KUPHATIKIZAPO ZITSANZO ZONSE ZA KUCHITIKA, KUKHULUPIRIKA, NDIPONSO ZITSANZO ZONSE ZOFUNIKA KUCHITA ZINTHU ZOFUNIKA KWAMBIRI.
text_about_content5: Pulogalamuyi yamasuliridwa kuti muzitha kugwiritsa ntchito pulogalamu yomasulira yoyendetsedwa ndi Google Translate. Kuyesayesa koyenera kwachitika kuti kumasulira kolondola, komabe, palibe kumasulira kwadzidzidzi komwe sikungakhale koyenera kapena cholinga chake m'malo mwa omasulira anthu. Zomasulira zimaperekedwa ngati ntchito kwa ogwiritsa ntchito tsamba la marcoparrone.com, ndipo zimaperekedwa "monga momwe zilili." Palibe chitsimikizo chamtundu uliwonse, chofotokozedwa kapena chofotokozedwapo, chomwe chimapangidwa molondola, molondola, kapena molondola pamasuliridwe aliwonse ochokera ku Chingerezi kupita mchilankhulo china chilichonse. Zina (monga zithunzi, makanema, Flash, ndi zina zambiri) sizingamasuliridwe molondola chifukwa chakuchepa kwa pulogalamu yomasulira.
text_about_content6: Zolemba zake ndi mtundu wachingerezi patsamba lino. Zolakwika zilizonse zomwe zidachitika mukutanthauzira sizikhala zomangika ndipo sizikhala ndi zotsatirapo zalamulo pakutsatira kapena kukwaniritsa. Ngati pangakhale mafunso okhudzana ndi kulondola kwa zidziwitso zomwe zili patsamba lawebusayiti, lembani mtundu wachingerezi wa webusayiti yomwe ili mtundu wovomerezeka.
